name: Luscious Lemon Tarts
description: Prepare the Luscious Lemon Curd ahead of time to get these delicious tarts on the table in 20 min! The curd is zesty, gluten-free, and nut-free, made effortlessly in the microwave. Keep it real and easy by opting for frozen premade pie shells – because who has time for dough drama? Serve at your next Easter brunch, afternoon tea, or baby shower!
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 375° F. 
  2. Place tart shells on Sheet Pan. Bake for 10–12 min, or until golden. 
  3. Remove tarts from foil cups. Let cool, then spoon in lemon curd, about 1 tbsp per tart.
tips: Tarts taste best well-chilled. If time allows, refrigerate 10–15 min before serving. If making ahead, bake tart shells and prep lemon curd overnight. Refrigerate until ready to use. Fill tarts up to 2 hours before serving.
